QuestData.Title: Wrath of Gronn
QuestData.Description: The Thunderlord are capturing gronn for the Iron Horde. Show these fools why gronn are NOT pets. $b$bFollow us into Grulloc's Grotto and sunder the chains of the captive gronn. Let the beasts seek to gain their own vengeance against the Thunderlord.$b$bMeet us at Grulloc's Lair beneath the grotto when you are done.
QuestData.RewardText: For many years I hunted all sorts of prey alongside my father. This hunt shall honor his memory as well as avenge his death at the hands of these traitorous, honorless Thunderlords.
